name: It's Not You, It's Me
description:
CW// abusive relationship

A visual novel exploring relationships, break ups, regrets and missed connections. You play as Katie, a young woman being stood up on a blind date. As you begin to daydream you reminisce on your past relationships and wonder what things could have been...

Developed by Jason Khan. Character art created using Artbreeder AI. Stock images used for backgrounds.

Music by Incompetech.

Word count : 34,428

This game is written in American English to fit the character but I'm British, so some phrasings may not make as much sense.
